column4: Does anyone know if it's possible to turn a wireless card "on" even if it has no on/off switch?
You most likely don't have the Wireless driver for it. Wireless was always a PITA to get working.
How can I figure out what driver I need?
By the name of the card. If you don't know it, PM me, I'll help you so you can actually read what I say o.o
